General_Description: '''For the Blue Banner''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "Some [[Sparta]]n [[Hoplite]]s use the help of [[Mercenary|mercenaries]] to invade [[Athens|our]] land. Kill the Hoplites and their [[guard]]s so the mercenaries won't have work."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed numerous Spartan Hoplites and [[brute]]s all over [[Greece]], as well as some Spartan [[Nation Leader|leaders]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
